ISSUE.TITLE: Module template project with Part: Settings not working
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: When you use the `dotnet new ocmodulecms -n ModuleName.OrchardCore --AddPart true --PartName Test` , the Part settings are not correctly taken into account https://docs.orchardcore.net/en/dev/docs/getting-started/templates/#create-a-new-cms-module

COMMIT.MESSAGE: Module Project template with Part Settings Fixes #7028
